description:
""I never thought I'd see anything like this. It's a science fiction nightmare. It's Kafkaesque, it's Orwellian. There are not enough words that you can throw at it to capture the horror of what's happening. This is a bomb that is being dropped on our society, on human civilization, on our economy, on our culture, on our democracy, on everything that we value, by the vaccine industry."" 
- Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. (1986: The Act)

Movie streaming now at www.1986TheAct.com (link in bio)

#1986TheAct #GeorgeOrwell #1984 #HealthFreedom
